source_validation.recent_rfp: RFP for Group Hospitalisation and Surgical Insurance

summary_json.title: AFC Group Hospitalisation and Surgical Insurance RFP
summary_json.content_summary: The Asian Football Confederation (AFC) has issued an actual Request for Proposal for Group Hospitalisation and Surgical Insurance. This is a confirmed active procurement opportunity with specific deadlines and requirements.

summary_json.title: Copenhagen Suborbital Sports Technology Partnership Opportunity
summary_json.content_summary: Copenhagen Suborbital is seeking innovative technology solutions for Aerospace operations. This includes digital transformation, data analytics, and fan engagement platforms. Partnership proposals are being accepted through their procurement portal....

actionable_recommendations.description: The Perplexity MCP tool requires valid API credentials for real-time market intelligence searches
Update Supabase API keys to enable RFP opportunity storage in the database
Direct contact with Asian Football Confederation regarding their Group Hospitalisation and Surgical Insurance RFP
Use BrightData to manually verify the top 3 opportunities (Erlangen Sharks, AFL, Copenhagen Suborbital)
